## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Load Data
```{r}
iowa_24_25 <- read_csv(here::here("Data", "Iowa_Liquor_Sales_2024_2025.csv"))
iowa_pop <- read_excel(here::here("Data", "Iowa_City_Populations.xlsx"),
                       skip = 3)
```

## Clean Data
```{r}
iowa_pop <- iowa_pop |>
  mutate(City = str_extract(`...1`, "^[^,]+")) |>
  select(City, `2020`, `2021`, `2022`, `2023`, `2024`)
```
